name: camel
content:
camel noun
(ANIMAL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 [ C ] a large animal with a long neck, that lives in the desert and has one or two humps (= large raised areas of flesh) on its back Compare
Bactrian
dromedary
GlobalP/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages

camel noun
(CLOTH)
[ U ] (also camel hair) a soft, pale brown cloth made from wool and used to make coats
Leland Bobbe/The Image Bank/GettyImages

a large animal of desert areas that has a long neck and a back with either one or two humps (= large raised parts)
